name: Noir Charade (Douzane)
description:
💻 Synopsis

One night in 1955 in Brooklyn, you incorporate a detective who got a call from an alleged assassination attempt. Now, inside the apartment, you must gather pieces of evidence in order to find out the truth of what happened in that apartment.

📜 Key Features
  • Explore - Navigate through a crime scene, and attempt to put together all pieces in order to uncover the truth about what happened to the owner.
  • Conclusions - Deduct on your clues. Every clue will give you 3 to 5 options that you must use and put together to know the truth about what happened in the apartment.
  • Atmosphere - Alfred Hitchcock inspired house and setting.
  • Black & White Asthetic - Psycho/60's inspired film effects.
📚 Developer's Message

Hey hey, thank you for checking out this game. It was developed for a college game jam, and I had tons of fun developing it. I was able to test out not only different lighting settings but also try to play more around Post Processing Effects than in previous games. AND it was like a goodbye to Unity Standard Pipeline.

I sincerely hope you enjoy it :)

🗣 Few Warnings
  • The game uses motion blur.
  • The game has from 10 to 30 minutes of gameplay.
  • You can play it with a controller :)
  • I hope you have fun <3
